abstract: As a founder of the Chemical Bank’s mergers-and-acquisitions unit, Mr. Tarbell played a crucial role in several notable deals.
snippet: As a founder of the Chemical Bank’s mergers-and-acquisitions unit, Mr. Tarbell played a crucial role in several notable deals.
lead_paragraph: John Weatherbee Tarbell Jr., an investment banker who led Chemical Bank’s first leveraged buyout group, died on Saturday in Manhattan. He was 67 and lived in Manhattan.

headline.main: John Tarbell Jr., Bank Executive, Dies at 67
